title: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing a new image into the layout, the image is not being refreshed. The original image is still displayed.
EB: After importing a new image into the layout, the image should be refreshed and the new image should be displayed.
SR:
1. Import a new image (e.g., image1.jpg) into the layout again.
2. Verify that the new image is displayed.
